name: Swamp Goblin

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

other_info: Swamp Goblins are skilled hunters and ambushers, using the dense vegetation of the swamp to their advantage.
